dict.acceptation: 半；一半；（啤酒等饮料的）半品脱；（比赛、音乐会等的）半场；

sent.orig: Study and Verification of Raised-root cosine filter, half-band filter, CIC filter on multi-design tools.
sent.trans: 利用多种工具对raised-rootcosinefilter,half-bandfilter,CICfilter进行设计、验证。

sent.orig: Half-height drive A mounting space for half-height devices, such as half-height drives, in a computer's case.
sent.trans: 半高驱动器架在计算机机箱中，半高设备的安装空间，如半高驱动器。

sent.orig: JB series horizontal-lift half-tone pringting machine is a kind of half-automatic plane half-tone printing machine.
sent.trans: JB系列平升式网版印刷机是半自动平面网版印刷机。

sent.orig: Handel was half German, half Italian, and half English.
sent.trans: 韩德尔是半德国人，半意大利人，半英国人。

sent.orig: An optimist sees a half-filled glass half full, while a pessimist thinks it's half empty.
sent.trans: 同样是半杯水，乐观主义者看到的是杯子半满，悲观主义者看到的是杯子半空。
